front.title: Evaluation of cloud computing services based on NIST SP 800-145

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This document provides clarification for qualifying a given computing capability as a cloud service by determining if it aligns with the NIST definition of cloud computing; and for categorizing a cloud service according to the most appropriate service model (SaaS, PaaS, or IaaS).
